text: Welcome to Business Builder.
We are honored to have Mr. Nguyen Doan Ket,
Vice Chairman of the Board of Directors,
Deputy General Director of Rang Dong Company,
leading manufaturer of LED lights in Vietnam here today.
Nice to meet you Mr. Ket.
Recently Rang Dong has become an outstanding company
in the manufacturing industry in Vietnam.
Could you please share with us some of the highlights of the brand

as well as how the smart lighting system
has developed in recent times?
Rang Dong is a leading enterprise in Vietnam in the field of lighting.
Rang Dong has a history of 62 years
and up to now has gone through 4 stages of technology
from incandescent light bulb,

low pressure discharge lamps
such as fluorescent and compact lamps,
to LED lighting and now smart LED lighting.

Currently, Rang Dong has been implementing
a digital transformation strategy
whereby we have now achieved a new growth
which is twice as high as the period before digital transformation.
That result is achieved thanks to the completion and development
of Rang Dong's 4.0 ecosystem of products and services,
the establishment of a smart manufacturing factory,
the development based on Digital business model
the development based on Digital business model
You’ve just mentioned the smart ecosystem.
Could you share more about how it works
and how Rang Dong's customers will benefit from it?
Rang Dong's product and service ecosystem
is based on the integration of lighting and IoT technologies,
Rang Dong has been applying such ecosystem in three areas
namely Smart home, Smart city and Smart farm.
For example, it can create light sources
that is compatible with the circadian cycle of the human body.

In the morning, it can make people work more efficiently
and energetic.
At night, it can help people fall asleep more easily.
Rang Dong's light sources can create wavelengths

which are suitable for the growth
and development cycle of each type of animal and plant,
stimulating the improvement of productivity.

It is clear that the benefits brought about by
the smart ecosystem are undeniable.
However, it is certain that there will be obstacles
in the establishment, operation and scaling of the system.
Can you please share about the challenges
when accessing new technology platforms
during Rang Dong’s development of products and smart ecosystem?

Rang Dong was originally a manufacturer of light sources
and lighting equipment
so IT was not our forte.
Due to such difficulties, we have cooperated with both AWS
and especially AWS's partner - TechX.
and especially AWS's partner - TechX.
We have built a system that ensures stability and reliability
while being cost-effective.
The cost is only incurred when we use the system.
We use cloud computing and edge computing,
so the fee we pay is very economical.

What is more important is that through the collaboration
with AWS and TechX,
Rang Dong's IT team has developed strongly
through practical implementation and training.

In particular, a system like AWS will ensure
high-level confidentiality and security,
thereby bringing trust to customers
and enhancing a seamless customer experience.
Could you please share more about Rang Dong's upcoming plans

and how AWS can support
and accompany Rang Dong in those projects?
We hope to cooperate with AWS in the future
so that AWS can equip Rang Dong
and Rang Dong can integrate its products
and IOT core on the AWS platform,
store data on AWS, utilize AWS's cloud services
towards better customer service and customer experience.
The cooperation with AWS opens up opportunities for Rang Dong
to integrate with other Smart home ecosystems,
enhance the growth of Rang Dong's product ecosystem.

Thank you and  Rang Dong for participating
in Business Builder today.
Thank you so much.
See you in the next episode of Business Builder.
